about.botoholt-text: Botoholt is a handy bot for streamers that allows viewers to shazam tracks and more
about.connect-text: To connect and use our bot in the future, you just need to log in through Twitch
about.connect-text-2: To connect and use our bot, you must write
about.support-text: If you want to support the authors of the project with a coin, then you can do

da.action: Paste the link to the widget with Donation Alerts
da.clue: To find the link to the widget, go to the DA website - go to
da.message: Connect Donation Alerts to edit and customize related commands and unlock cool features like top songs, top DJs, and more!
da.title: Connection Donation Alerts

integrations.page-description: On this page you can connect various platforms

admin-page.sing-out: Are you sure to sing out?

songs.description: On this page you can see the queue and history of custom songs, as well as top DJs and top songs

support.description: If you have any problems while using Botoholt, you can find the answer to your question or describe your problem in the discord

discord.description: If the list does not answer your question, then write to Urbinholt in discord
discord.title: The list does not answer my question, who should I contact?

empty.text: Create your first custom command by clicking on the 'Add command' button
empty.title: At the moment, the list of custom commands is empty

connect-bot: Want to add a bot to your stream?
connect-bot-text-1: If you want to connect Botoholt, then just write to
dont-show-link: Don't show the link to anyone

commands.description: Add key names for the team (minimum 1, maximum 10)

scenarios.text-1: Answer variations will be activated randomly.
scenarios.text-2: Be aware that the variables you use may have different lengths.
scenarios.text-3: Therefore, we do not recommend using more than one copy of a variable in one response, otherwise the message may be cut off (the maximum length of a message in twitch chat is 500 characters)
scenarios.title: Response Scenarios

titles.failure-shazam: Answers when a song fails shazam
titles.last-faliure: Answer for failing to determine the last song played
titles.last-success-da: Answer for the last song played if it was played in DonationAlerts
titles.last-success-shazam: Answer for last playing song if it was shazamed
titles.queue-faliure: Answer if the queue is empty and the songs are paused
titles.queue-success: Answer if the song queue is not empty
titles.success-da-song: Answers if the song plays in DonationAlerts
titles.success-shazam: Answers when the song is successfully shazam
titles.which-faliure: Answer when determining the place in the queue of songs is unsuccessful
titles.which-success: Answer upon successful determination of the place in the queue of songs

warning.text: Are you sure you want to exit without saving your changes?
warning.title: You have not saved your changes!
